TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnvalidatedRequestValues extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 HTTP 请求值的访问权限，不触发 ASP.NET 请求验证。

span.span: Provides access to HTTP request values without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 ASP.NET 读取请求 HTTP 中的值的集合 (如， ，和集合)，它执行*请求验证*。When ASP.NET reads the values in HTTP request collections (such as the , , and collections), it performs *request validation*. 请求验证过程 ASP.NET 检查发送的值，并确定它们是否包含标记、 脚本或保留的字符。During request validation, ASP.NET examines the posted values and determines whether they contain markup, script, or reserved characters. 默认情况下，如果 ASP.NET 检测到的所有这些类型的输入，则会引发异常。By default, if ASP.NET detects any of these types of input, it throws an exception. 这有助于防止在网站上的恶意脚本注入式攻击。This helps prevent malicious script injection attacks on your website. 但是，在某些情况下，你可能想要跳过 ASP.NET 请求验证，并允许包含标记、 脚本或保留的字符的值。However, in some cases, you might want to bypass ASP.NET request validation and allow values that contain markup, script, or reserved characters. 例如，如果你的应用程序使用多格式文本编辑器，可帮助用户提交带格式的内容作为 HTML 标记，你可以使用的成员类而不会触发默认 ASP.NET 请求中检索的多格式文本请求值验证。For example, if your application uses a rich-text editor that enables users to submit HTML markup as formatted content, you can use the members of the class to retrieve the rich-text request values without triggering the default ASP.NET request validation. 你可以在代码中，来访问使用此类的成员属性。In your code, you access members of this class by using the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此类，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this class, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cookies As HttpCookieCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpCookieCollection ^ Cookies { System::Web::HttpCookieCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下发送的 Cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of cookies that the client sent, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的 cookie。

span.span: The cookies from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Files As HttpFileCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpFileCollection ^ Files { System::Web::HttpFileCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取客户端上传的文件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of files that the client uploaded, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的文件。

span.span: The files from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

span.span: Gets the collection of form variables that the client submitted, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的变量形式。

span.span: The form variables from the HTTP request.

The headers from the HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RawUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ RawUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取遵循网站名称的请求的 URL 的部分内容。

span.span: Gets the part of the requested URL that follows the website name, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 遵守网站名称的 URL 部件。

span.span: The part of the URL that follows the website name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 如果完整请求 URL 是`http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44`的值是`/default.aspx?id=44`。If the complete request URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44`, the value of is `/default.aspx?id=44`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: Gets the URL data for the request without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 一个对象，它包含该请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: An object that contains the URL data for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 你可以检索 URL 数据，如端口号、 主机名、 路径信息和有关从用户的数据此属性返回的对象。You can retrieve URL data such as the port number, host name, path information, and data about the user from the object that this property returns.
